inforProductDetail.title: Description
inforProductDetail.subTitle: The radiance lives on in the Nike Air Force 1 '07, the basketball original that puts a fresh spin on what you know best: durably stitched overlays, clean finishes and the perfect amount of flash to make you shine.
inforProductDetail.content:
Colour Shown: White/Light Lemon Twist/Volt/Black
Style: DR2670-101

inforProductDetail.title: Size & Fit
inforProductDetail.content:
Snug fit; we recommend ordering half a size up
Size Guide

inforProductDetail.title: Free Delivery and Returns
inforProductDetail.subtitle: Your order of 5.000.000₫ or more gets free standard delivery.
inforProductDetail.content:
Standard delivered 4-5 Business Days
Express delivered 2-4 Business Days

reviews.name: Honest Review
reviews.contetent: I'm going to be honest here. Nike InfinityRN is very comfortable, but the shoes become slightly heavier when you're running uphill. Overall, I'll give this a 3 out of 5!
